description: This file is a shell script used for managing telemetry and interchip communication in the system. It includes functions for executing commands over SSH, copying files, starting and stopping daemons, and handling various event-driven operations related to telemetry data and inter-device communication.

methods.name: echo_t
methods.description: Logs a message with the current date and time.

methods.name: dropbearRecovery
methods.description: Recovers or starts the dropbear SSH server if it is not running.

methods.name: clearTelemetrySeekValues
methods.description: Clears telemetry seek markers and temporary directories.

methods.name: sshCmdOnAtom
methods.description: Executes a given command on the atom device via SSH.

methods.name: sshCmdOnArm
methods.description: Executes a given command on the ARM device via SSH.

methods.name: startInterChipDaemon
methods.description: Initiates the interchip daemon on the target device via SSH.

methods.name: stopInterChipDaemon
methods.description: Stops the interchip daemon on the target device.

methods.name: copyProfileToAtom
methods.description: Copies the log profile configuration to the atom device.

methods.name: notifyGetGrepResultFromAtom
methods.description: Notifies the atom device to provide grep results.

methods.name: notifyProfileRemoveToAtom
methods.description: Instructs the atom device to remove a specific profile.

methods.name: startT2DaemonOnAtom
methods.description: Starts the telemetry 2.0 daemon on the atom device.

methods.name: notifyERReadyToAtom
methods.description: Notifies the atom device that the event receiver is ready.

methods.name: copyLogsFromArm
methods.description: Copies logs from the ARM device to the local system.

methods.name: copyProfileFromArm
methods.description: Copies the log profile configuration from the ARM device.

methods.name: notifyDaemonStarted
methods.description: Notifies the ARM device that the daemon has started.

methods.name: notifyDaemonFailed
methods.description: Notifies the ARM device that the daemon has failed to start.

methods.name: copyJsonResultToArm
methods.description: Copies JSON results to the ARM device.

methods.name: copyT2CacheFileToArm
methods.description: Copies the telemetry cache file from the atom device to the ARM device.
